abstract.p: Dan Bloch letter questions whether women in computer science are concerned that they will become antisocial nerds or concerned that they will meet men who are antisocial nerds (July 27 article)

block.p: In the article about women in computing, the quotation about the image of people in computer science being that of white, male, antisocial nerds is strange. Does the statement mean that women are concerned that they will turn into white, male, antisocial nerds if they study computer science? Does it mean that women are leaving the field because they don't think they will meet eligible men? DAN BLOCH Pittsburgh
